title: wtf is this bs on thresh

replies.body:
Read Thresh's E.

Stop crying.

Also lying through your teeth. You weren't playing a "tank" and you didn't have 3k HP.
You were playing glass cannon Yi Top. And by playing i mean feeding (2-15-5). Even at level 18 (which you didn't reach) he only has 2163 base HP.

Well that's ad thesh for starters, not supp. And his e has a 200% on first hit scale, DOING MAGIC not critting, if he did crit that much, you had no armor, he had a lot of armor pen and he had ie 400 x 2.5 = 1000 that extra 500? that's a tonne of pen if he critted that much. So what your doing is either exaggerating or counting his e damage as well, which would do around 1500 with resistances applied, (400 x 2.5) + (400 x 2) = 1800/resistance% 
and if he had shiv
(400 x 2.5) + (400 x 2) + (100 x 2) = 2000/resistance%
I hope you don't type your essay like this...
